name: IG Group
title: Three-Month ROI Achievement

classification.classificationRationale: IG Group deployed AI (Claude) through their existing Data and AI transformation team into targeted use cases (analytics automation, HR performance feedback, multilingual content). The AI was embedded into specific team workflows rather than housed in a separate unit. Contextual orientation: adoption driven by existing teams identifying high-value use cases. Confidence Low: single vendor source (Anthropic customer story), limited organizational detail.

description:
IG Group, a global leader in online trading, deployed Claude through their Data and AI transformation team with remarkable speed to value, achieving full ROI within three months.
- Targeted three specific use cases: automating complex analytics workflows, HR performance feedback, multilingual content
- Analytics teams now save 70 hours weekly
- Certain use cases saw productivity double
- Focus on high-impact, high-frequency tasks rather than broad enterprise rollout
- Demonstrated value quickly, building organizational confidence for broader adoption

observableMarkers.metrics: Full ROI in 3 months. 70 hours/week saved in analytics. Productivity doubled in certain use cases. Targeted: analytics automation, HR feedback, multilingual content.
